New Records: Francisco Lindor has 29 home runs, the fourth most among all MLB shortstops this season
Key Match Events: Sean Manaea pitched 7 scoreless innings with 5 strikeouts, his fourth straight quality start
Francisco Lindor broke a scoreless tie in the fourth inning with a home run
Pre-Game Insights: The Mets needed to keep the intensity and stay locked in to match the energy of the White Sox
Manager Carlos Mendoza emphasized the importance of a strong performance from Manaea
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Carlos Mendoza expressed pride in the team's ability to complete the sweep
Francisco Lindor reflected on the team's position in the NL Wild Card standings and the importance of continuing to climb
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets completed a 7-3 road trip, including a series win over the D-backs and a four-game series split against the Padres
The Mets are now one game behind the Braves in the NL Wild Card standings
